name: Captain Othelstan

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
text: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

trait.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution
text: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points. If he has 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.

action.name: Flail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

description: Source: Hoard of the Dragon Queen p. 89
